item.title: Virtual Boy: Nintendo’s Biggest Console Failure - GameWreck
item.description: The single biggest failure in Nintendo history has a few strange mysteries of its own.

item.title: The Argument for Another Monster Hunter Wilds Beta Before Launch
item.description:
Summary

  • Monster Hunter Wilds needs a second beta test to address performance issues from the first one.
  • Frame Generation technology requirements were a major concern during the first beta test.
  • A potential second beta test could help reassure disappointed players and showcase performance improvements.

Monster Hunter Wilds is inching ever closer to its release, as the year is now 2025 and that means Capcom's latest entry in the Monster Hunter franchise is nearly here. After a somewhat successful open beta test from October 31 to November 3, 2024, Monster Hunter Wilds drove its stake even deeper into the ground for 2025's most anticipated games. However, some issues with the beta test make a compelling argument for a second beta test ahead of the game's launch.

Monster Hunter Wilds ' launch may be right around the corner, but it could still use a second beta test before launch. This is primarily due to some performance issues that occurred during the first open beta, and the fact that a second open beta could reassure those who encountered the issues that they have been dealt with.

Why Monster Hunter Wilds Should Have Another Beta Before Launch

Many Players Experienced Technical Issues With the First Monster Hunter Wilds Beta

While the gameplay portion of Monster Hunter Wilds ' first beta was received somewhat positively, its performance took a pretty significant hit. Players on mid-range PCs reported encountering several performance issues during Monster Hunter Wilds ' first beta test, like low frame rates, graphical glitches, and crashes, even when their systems met the recommended PC specifications for the game. Some players even noted severe visual degradation, with characters and monsters loading in as low-polygon models reminiscent of early 3D games.

Monster Hunter Wilds ' apparent reliance on Frame Generation was a major point of contention for the beta, as it seems as though the technology is all but necessary in order for the game to perform well. According to Monster Hunter Wilds ' official PC specifications, in order to achieve 1080p at 60 fps, players would need to have Frame Generation enabled. Unfortunately, NVIDIA's Frame Generation technology is limited to its RTX 40 Series, although AMD offers greater access to the feature by including it in its latest and previous-generation GPUs. Nevertheless, Monster Hunter Wilds ' Frame Generation requirements raised concerns during the first beta test, especially for those whose GPUs didn't include the technology.

While the gameplay portion of Monster Hunter Wilds ' first beta was received somewhat positively, its performance took a pretty significant hit.

While some would argue that issues like these are really why beta tests are a thing in the first place, it's still likely unsettling for those who plan to play Monster Hunter Wilds when it comes out but are now skeptical of the game after its beta performance. However, Capcom responded to the performance issues by setting up a troubleshooting and feedback thread for players who were reporting such difficulties. Since then, the developer has released updates to let players know it is addressing the issues, including plans to lower the system requirements for the PC version of Monster Hunter Wilds and improve its performance across a wider range of hardware.

A Second Beta Would Give Capcom a Chance to Prove Those Issues Are Gone

It might not be enough for Capcom to simply let players know that the issues are being resolved, however, as some may still have a bitter taste left in their mouth after the game's beta. As such, in order for Capcom to ensure it retains the attention of those who once held an interest in Monster Hunter Wilds but were disappointed by their experiences with the beta, the only option may be to open up the game for a second beta test and prove that the performance issues it once had are gone for good. A second beta test would also give any players who missed their opportunity to play the first beta another chance to create their character and get a decent hands-on preview of Monster Hunter Wilds .

Monster Hunter Wilds might not have done enough yet to lose Capcom's goodwill among fans, but a second beta test could ensure that never happens, especially if it performed much better than the first. At this point, there's no indication that Capcom plans to do a second beta test, but if it does, it will need to hop on it fast. Monster Hunter Wilds ' February 28 release date is nearly here.

item.title: Roblox: Fazbear World Tower Defense Codes (January 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Fazbear World Tower Defense Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Fazbear World Tower Defense
  • How to Get More Fazbear World Tower Defense Codes

Fazbear World Tower Defense is a Roblox experience in the tower defense genre, in which you will need to summon characters from FNAF to fight waves of monsters. In this game, you can unlock your favorite characters from the franchise, level them up and earn currency for new characters, and so on. It will take some time to get rare heroes and in-game currency, but you can speed up the process by using the Fazbear World Tower Defense that can be found below.

Updated January 3, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: This guide serves as your ultimate resource for freebies and rewards. Regular updates make it the perfect place to find new codes.

All Fazbear World Tower Defense Codes

Working Fazbear World Tower Defense Codes

  • Lawsuit! - Redeem this code to get 500 cash
  • Poster - Redeem this code to get 500 cash
  • Christmas1 - Redeem this code to get 500 cash
  • 2024_Joy - Redeem this code to get 500 cash
  • Honor - Redeem this code to get 500 cash
  • ITSME - Redeem this code to get 500 cash

Expired Fazbear World Tower Defense Codes

  • DatLoss1 - Redeem this code to get 5000 cash
  • DatLoss2 - Redeem this code to get 500 cash
  • ThankYou1224 - Redeem this code to get 4000 cash

How to Redeem Codes for Fazbear World Tower Defense

The code redemption system in Fazbear World Tower Defense is pretty straightforward as it is similar to the one used in other free Roblox games, so you shouldn't have any problems with it. However, if you are a beginner or can't find where to redeem codes, follow the step-by-step instructions below:

  • Firstly, launch Fazbear World Tower Defense in Roblox .
  • Pay attention to the right side of the screen, where you will see three buttons.
  • Click on the topmost Shop button, and you will be taken to the Shop window.
  • In the lower right part of the store window, there will be an input field where you will need to enter, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above codes.

If everything is done correctly, you will receive a notification that the code is redeemed. However, if this did not happen, and you cannot redeem one of the codes, it may be expired. Also, make sure that you entered the code correctly and that you didn't enter an extra space, as these are some of the most common mistakes.

How to Get More Fazbear World Tower Defense Codes

All the codes for Fazbear World Tower Defense available at the moment are listed above. If you want to get more Roblox codes, make sure to bookmark this page since it will be updated regularly. You can also follow the game's official social media, where the developers occasionally post codes along with news, announcements, and content about the game.

  • Official Fazbear World Tower Defense Roblox group.
  • Official Fazbear World Tower Defense Discord server.

  • How to Play Military Tycoon
  • The Best Roblox Tycoon Games Like Military Tycoon

In Military Tycoon , Roblox players must build their base, trying their best to attack and not be defeated. The game has plenty of exciting activities. For example, players can destroy bases of NPCs or even other Roblox players using a wide variety of vehicles to get valuable in-game resources. In this article, fans of the game will find Military Tycoon codes that they can redeem for all sorts of great in-game goodies.

Updated January 3, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are currently no active codes to share, but we will update this list as soon as new ones become available. Bookmark this guide so you don't lose track of your freebies.

All Military Tycoon Codes

How to Redeem Codes in Military Tycoon

Everything that players need to do to redeem codes in Roblox: Military Tycoon is mentioned below. Follow these steps to claim free rewards:

  1. Open Roblox and launch Military Tycoon.
  2. Look at the left-bottom side of the screen and find the Thumbs Up button. Press on it.
  3. In the pop-up menu, insert the code from this article and then click the REDEEM button.

Players should keep in mind that codes in Military Tycoon are time-limited, just like in many other Roblox games. With this in mind, they should try to redeem any active Military Tycoon codes as soon as possible.

How to Play Military Tycoon

Military Tycoon is a game where players must build a base, but there is also a lot of additional content. Base building is similar to other games of this genre, but at the same time, players also organize raids on other bases, complete missions to liberate and capture territories and build tanks, helicopters, and other equipment.

The Best Roblox Tycoon Games Like Military Tycoon

Tycoon is a popular genre that is really quite interesting, especially on the Roblox platform. If players want to find something similar but often stumble upon low-quality experiences, there's no need to worry. Below, they'll be able to find some of the best Roblox games like Military Tycoon :

  • Restaurant Tycoon 2

  • Anime Power Tycoon
  • Princess Castle Tycoon

item.title: Roblox: Brawl Stars Tower Defense Codes (January 2025)
item.description:
Brawl Stars Tower Defense combines the beloved tower defense genre and the popular mobile game Brawl Stars into a cool Roblox experience that will bring you unforgettable emotions. Here, you will need to fight off numerous waves of enemies by assembling a team of Brawl Stars characters, each with their own skills and advantages.

To quickly get the best of them, you can redeem Brawl Stars Tower Defense codes. Most of the rewards from the codes will be currency such as Coins and Gems, but this is exactly what you need to unlock new characters and improve them.

Updated January 3, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Codes can pop up at any time, and we’ll have them ready for you here. Keep this guide handy and revisit it whenever needed.

All Brawl Stars Tower Defense Codes

Working Brawl Stars Tower Defense Codes

  • ALMOST1M - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • THANKYOU - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • 30KMEMBERS - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • 10Kvotes - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • 3.5kMEMBERS - Redeem this code to get 400 Gems.
  • 65kVISITS - Redeem this code to get 250 Coins.
  • ULTIMATEDDEFENCE - Redeem this code to get 150 Coins.
  • FreeGems - Redeem this code to get Gems.
  • Defense - Redeem this code to get Coins.
  • Release - Redeem this code to get Coins.
  • !1kvisits! - Redeem this code to get rewards.

Expired Brawl Stars Tower Defense Codes

There are currently no expired Brawl Stars Tower Defense codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming Brawl Stars Tower Defense can greatly simplify your gameplay and save a lot of time. Instead of hours of grinding or staying in the AFK arena, you can get tons of currency in seconds, so be sure to take advantage of this opportunity.

How to Redeem Codes for Brawl Stars Tower Defense

Redeeming Brawl Stars Tower Defense codes will take you a few minutes or even less if you've done something similar in other Roblox games. We have also created a step-by-step guide for those who do not know or understand how the redemption system works.

  • Launch Brawl Stars Tower Defense .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be several buttons arranged in a column. Among them, interact with the second one with the shopping cart icon.
  • This will open the in-game store. Here, scroll to the very end of the menu to find the redemption section.
  • The redemption section will contain an input field and a green Redeem button below it. In the input field, copy and paste one of the working codes from the list above.
  • Lastly, click on the green Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see the words “Code Redeemed!” in the input field and the rewards will be credited to your account.

How to Get More Brawl Stars Tower Defense Codes

If you want to get even more rewards, then you need to find more Roblox codes. Luckily, you can visit and monitor the game's official social media where the developers regularly post them, so be careful not to miss anything:

  • Official Brawl Stars Tower Defense Roblox group.
  • Official Brawl Stars Tower Defense Discord server.
  • Official Brawl Stars Tower Defense YouTube channel.
